original_text: Therefore because the king's commandment was urgent, and the furnace exceeding hot, the flames of the fire slew those men that took up Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego.
korean_text: 왕의 명령이 엄하고 풀무불이 심히 뜨거우므로 불꽃이 사드락과 메삭과 아벳느고를 붙든 사람을 태워 죽였고

sentences.original_text: Therefore because the king's commandment was urgent
the flames of the fire slew those men
that took up Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사드락과 메삭과 아벳네고를 붙잡은 사람들이었다
